item.title: Environment Requirements
item.description: This section introduces the environment requirements for KubeSphere Enterprise. System Requirements OS Minimum Requirements (per node) Requirements for Production Environment (per node) Ubuntu 16.04, 18.04, 20.04, 22.04 CPU: 2 cores, Memory: 4 GB, Disk: 40 GB CPU: 8 cores, Memory: 16 GB, Disk: 200 GB Debian 9, Debian 10 CPU: 2 cores, Memory: 4 GB, Disk: 40 GB
